      • fixBeatsGivenSubBeatLength

        private java.util.List<Beat> fixBeatsGivenSubBeatLength(java.util.List<Beat> oldBeats)
        Fix the given Beats List based on the set TimeTracker.subBeatLength. That is, remove or add tacti as needed to get the desired number of tacti per sub beat.
        Parameters:
        oldBeats - The old Beat List.
        Returns:
        The new, fixed Beat List.

        public TimeSignature getFirstTimeSignature()
        Get the first non-dummy time signature in this song.
        Overrides:
        getFirstTimeSignature in class TimeTracker
        Returns:
        The TimeSignature of the first node which isn't a dummy, or the initial dummy TimeSignature if there is none.
